task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile Wallet - Write A Blogpost Demonstrating The KYC Level 1 & 2 Use Cases
description:
MifosPay has different KYC Levels, out of which, only KYC Level 1 and 2 are functional. The objective is to create a blog that demonstrate the KYC Level 1, KYC Level 2 Usecases. The link to the APK of the MifosPay App is shown below.
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or email the corresponding mentors assigned to the task or you can message on [Gitter Channel](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos) too.
